name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: one language of its creator\'s choice

traits.Magic Weapons: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.Multiattack: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.
actions.Maul: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6): The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
